title: wtt/wts: Ty Cobb Bat-on for bat-off
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: wtt/wts: Ty Cobb Bat-on for bat-off
posts.post_content:
I got this in a trade from Rob A (Hi Rob) years ago, but recently acquired another one so don't have use for the two. This card is a beauty except for the small pin hole and some wear on the edge.

 I'd prefer a trade + me adding cash for a higher graded bat off, but willing to negotiate. Selling it is a second tier option right now. LMK if you have any to trade.

email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] or PM me if you have any available. Thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=285024&d=1503495620[/IMG]
